Uses of Interface
com.documentum.operations.IDfOperationContext

Packages that use IDfOperationContext
Package
Description
com.documentum.operations
Provides interfaces to common high-level client functionality, such as functionality for checking in and checking out documents, and checking out all the documents in a virtual document.

  • Uses of IDfOperationContext in com.documentum.operations

    Method
    Description
    IDfOperationContext
    IDfOperation.getContext()
    Gets operation context for this operation instance
